channel.title: Winter Driving on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Winter Driving on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: UT-66 South - Winter Closure on UT-65
item.description: UT-65 closed to southbound traffic 16 miles ahead. Taken on UT-66 leaving Morgan. A portion of UT-65 between UT-66 and I-80 is closed during the winter months.

item.title: ID-38 East - Winter Maintenance
item.description: Winter maintenance hours on ID-38 between Holbrook and Malad City. Normal Snow Removal between hours of 6:00 AM and 6:00 PM.

item.title: End ID-38 - Old Highway 37 Winter Maintenance
item.description: End ID-38 / Begin Old Highway 37. Road is maintained by Oneida County next 14 miles from 8:00 AM to 5:00PM.

item.title: ID-78 West - Snow Plow Hours
item.description: ID-78 West - Normal Snow Removal Hours between 6 AM and 6 PM between Hammett and Bruneau.

item.title: US-191 North - Snowplow Hours
item.description: US-191 North - Road May Be Impassable - Limited Snowplow Operations. Plowed Monday through Friday 8 AM to 4 PM.

item.title: US-191 North - Closed When Flashing
item.description: US-191 North - Closed When Flashing due to winter weather.

item.title: US-191 North - Winter Driving Information
item.description: Winter Driving information for US-191 north in Wyoming - 8 miles ahead.

item.title: US-191 North - Daggett County
item.description: US-191 north in Daggett County. Winter closure sign for US-191 in Wyoming - 17 miles ahead. The winter closure sign appears to have been placed by the Wyoming DOT.

item.title: US-20 East - Road Closure Status
item.description: Road closure status between Hill City and Mountain Home on US-20 west, leaving Fairfield.
